body.div:
CE DECLARATION OF CONFORMITY
Appendix IIA / EN13414-3
According to the CE-Machinery directive (2006/42/CE). Undersigned, Paul Sillis, manager of EUROCABLE nv and holder of the technical report, declares that the goods meet all the fundamental safety and health requirements of the EC-machine directive, rovide that they are used and maintained according to the rules of good craftsmanship.
Surface: Galvanized
Tensile strength: 1960N/mm²
Construction: 7 x (6x36WS+iwrc)
Finish: endless grummet
Safety factor : 6,33-0,022*d

CE DECLARATION OF CONFORMITY
Appendix IIA / EN13414-3
According to the CE-Machinery directive (2006/42/CE). Undersigned, Paul Sillis, manager of EUROCABLE nv and holder of the technical report, declares that the goods meet all the fundamental safety and health requirements of the EC-machine directive, rovide that they are used and maintained according to the rules of good craftsmanship.
Surface: Galvanized
Tensile strength: 1960N/mm²
Construction: 7 x (6x36WS+iwrc)
Finish: endless grummet
Safety factor : 3:1

CE DECLARATION OF CONFORMITY
According to the CE-Machinery directive (2006/42/CE). Undersigned, Paul Sillis, manager of EUROCABLE nv and holder of the technical report, declares that the goods meet all the fundamental safety and health requirements of the EC-machine directive, provide that they are used and maintained according to the rules of good craftsmanship.
Safety factor : 5/1

CE DECLARATION OF CONFORMITY
We declare under our responsibility that the mentioned product(s), with CE marking, comply with the essential requirements of machinery directive 2006/42/EC, according to annex IIA. Our QC-manager is authorized to compile the technical file. We remind you that it is forbidden that the lifting equipment, in which the above product(s) is/are used, is put into operation before it is declared to be in compliance with the machinery directive rules.
Safety factor : 7/1

CE DECLARATION OF CONFORMITY
We declare under our responsibility that the mentioned product(s), with CE marking, comply with the essential requirements of machinery directive 2006/42/EC, according to annex IIA. Our QC-manager is authorized to compile the technical file. We remind you that it is forbidden that the lifting equipment, in which the above product(s) is/are used, is put into operation before it is declared to be in compliance with the machinery directive rules.
Safety factor : 6:1

declaration of incorporation (former IIB)
According to the CE-Machinery directive (2006/42/CE). According to the CE-Machinery directive (2006/42/CE). Undersigned, Paul Sillis, manager of EUROCABLE nv and holder of the technical report, declares that the goods meet all the fundamental safety and health requirements of the EC-machine directive, rovide that they are used and maintained according to the rules of good craftsmanship.

CE DECLARATION OF CONFORMITY
According to the CE-Machinery directive (2006/42/CE). Undersigned, Paul Sillis, manager of EUROCABLE nv and holder of the technical report, declares that the goods meet all the fundamental safety and health requirements of the EC-machine directive, provide that they are used and maintained according to the rules of good craftsmanship.
Safety factor : 4/1

DECLARATION OF CONFORMITY
In compliance with Machinery Directive 2006/42/EC Herewith we declare that the materials, as delivered, are made in accordance with the following specifications: Steel Wire Rope for usage by Hoist Nominal Diameter: 8.4mm 5x26WSR+HDPP (1960N/mm²,galvanized,RHOL, 54kN MBL) Finish: thimble with Talurit + bullet end It is not allowed to put the machinery into service until the machinery into which it is to be incorporated or of which it is to be a component, has been found and declared to be in conformity with the provisions Machinery Directive 2006/42/EC and with the national implementing legislation, as a whole, including the machinery referred to in this declaration. Attention: When the above described product is changed in any way, without our consent, this certificate is not valid anymore.
SWR Manufacturer: 4017

DECLARATION OF CONFORMITY
In compliance with Machinery Directive 2006/42/EC Herewith we declare that the materials, as delivered, are made in accordance with the following specifications: Steel Wire Rope for usage by Hoist Nominal Diameter: 8.4mm 5x26WSR+HDPP (1960N/mm²,galvanized,RHOL, 54kN MBL) Finish: thimble with Talurit & 2t shackle /bullet end It is not allowed to put the machinery into service until the machinery into which it is to be incorporated or of which it is to be a component, has been found and declared to be in conformity with the provisions Machinery Directive 2006/42/EC and with the national implementing legislation, as a whole, including the machinery referred to in this declaration. Attention: When the above described product is changed in any way, without our consent, this certificate is not valid anymore.
SWR Manufacturer: 4017

DECLARATION OF CONFORMITY
In compliance with Machinery Directive 2006/42/EC Herewith we declare that the materials, as delivered, are made in accordance with the following specifications: Steel Wire Rope for guiding purposes Nominal Diameter: 12mm Type: Galv. 7X19-G1770N-RHRL Min. Breaking Load: 102kN Actual Breaking Load: 108kN Finish: thimble with Talurit + bullet end It is not allowed to put the machinery into service until the machinery into which it is to be incorporated or of which it is to be a component, has been found and declared to be in conformity with the provisions Machinery Directive 2006/42/EC and with the national implementing legislation, as a whole, including the machinery referred to in this declaration. Attention: When the above described product is changed in any way, without our consent, this certificate is not valid anymore.
SWR Manufacturer: 4426
